_route_.description: If the exact shard name is not known, users may pass the _route_ value and the system would identify the name of the shard. Ignored if the shard param is also specified

node.description: The name of the node where the replica should be created

instanceDir.description: The instanceDir for the core that will be created

dataDir.description: The directory in which the core should be created

force-leader.description: In the unlikely event of a shard losing its leader, this command can be invoked to force the election of a new leader
